summary: Ever Wanted to have your very own Load Screens, then this Mod/tutorial is for you
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Info[/size][/center]
[center][size=6]This Mod/Tutorial is designed to give people a head start for making Load Screens[/size][/center]
[center][size=5]Includes an 11 minute video explaining how to create your very own Load Screens[/size][/center]
[center][size=6]If you have any more questions please leave a comment and I will do my best to answer[/size][/center]
[center][youtube]P_lCXYhEK2k[/youtube][/center]
